title: Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center Goes All In With $7 Million Renovation To Guest Suites
text:
Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center
Rooms at extended-stay hotel near UNLV now boast new furniture, modern decor and plush beds
LAS VEGAS , Aug. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Travelers looking for pristine accommodations near Sin City's hottest attractions can feel confident when placing a bet on Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center .
The hotel has completed a $7 million renovation on its laundry facilities and 256 spacious suites , each of which includes a fully equipped kitchen and separate spaces for sleeping, working and relaxing. Upgrades include fresh carpet, fixtures, wall vinyl and lighting as well as plush new mattresses, sofas, chairs and desk furniture.
In-room kitchens now feature refaced cabinets, new refrigerators and seamless Corian® countertops, which are extremely durable and easy to clean. Suite bathrooms have also been completely refreshed, and the hotel's on-site laundry facilities have been equipped with all-new washers and dryers.
Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center boasts a convenient location less than a mile from the University of Las Vegas, Nevada and just 25 minutes from the Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area, a popular destination for hiking, biking and rock climbing. Horseback riding and camping are also permitted in designated areas of the park.
The Las Vegas Strip, known for its glamourous casinos and nightclubs, is a five-minute drive from the hotel – ideal for visitors who want to experience the excitement of the city without paying top-dollar prices. The Hughes Center, a mixed-use business complex featuring a variety of restaurants and corporate offices, is just a short walk away.
Suites at the extended-stay Las Vegas hotel offer free wireless Internet, high ceilings, ergonomic workspaces and LCD TVs with premium movie channels. Cooking healthy, delicious meals is easy with full-size kitchens featuring up-to-date appliances and plenty of dishes, utensils and cookware.
Before venturing out to explore the city's countless attractions, travelers can enjoy complimentary breakfast in the stylish lobby. At the end of the day, guests are invited to attend The Residence Inn Mix™ , a free social hour highlighting local cuisine and libations every Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday evening.
Additional hotel amenities include a modern fitness center, sparkling outdoor pool and 1,500 square feet of sophisticated event space.
To book a stay at Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center, visit www.ResidenceInnLVHughesCenter.com or call 1-702-650-0040.
About Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center
Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center at 370 Hughes Center Drive in Las Vegas, NV offers a convenient location near the Las Vegas Strip, University of Nevada, Las Vegas , Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area and Hughes Center, a mixed-use business development featuring a variety of corporate offices and restaurants. The extended-stay hotel features 11 floors with 256 suites, a fitness center, outdoor pool and 1,500 square feet of flexible event space. Complimentary daily breakfast and wireless Internet are provided. For details, visit www.ResidenceInnLVHughesCenter.com or call 1-702-650-0040.
